meanings.sent1: The puppy was so lively, always running and playing.
meanings.sent2: The children at the party were very lively, laughing and dancing.
meanings.sent3: The lively squirrel kept darting around the yard, entertaining everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her lively imagination painted colorful pictures in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The lively music filled the room, making everyone want to dance.
